review_en: Swing Pang Pang Infant Safety Accident and Poor Response During Swing Pang Pang Riding with 4-year-old son at around 3 p.m. on September 24, the child suddenly stops while driving and starts again, causing the child's left eyebrow to crash into the handle. Swing-pang-pang is a ride in which an infant rides in a cup without a seat belt and swings around in the air, so no matter how fast an adult rides, he could be shocked enough if he suddenly stops. Immediately after the accident, the staff informed us that there were no safety issues, but the device had already stopped, and the child's face had a scar, but there was no safety issue.

review_en: I'd rather go to the local playground every time I come here. There's only a line everywhere. Magic passes are so obvious that it's obvious that I made them because I wanted to make more money. But when I get there, there's really no magic pass line. Why did you build an amusement park where no one can enjoy it properly, whether it's just a 100,000 won increase in entrance fees or a limit on the number of people? More than 30% of the rides are being inspected and closed, but the admission fee is the same.

review_en: I had a lot of fun. I joined the Let's Dream Parade as a kid. You transformed into a great mermaid and took part in the parade. I was nervous, but I was so moved by the way you waved your hands, holding Aladdin and Princess Jasmine's hand, going around Lotte World Adventure Square, taking nice pictures, and getting a lotty doll as a gift. review_en: I didn't laugh at all. I visited with my boyfriend to relieve my depression. When I saw the staff's faces at Lotte World, I wasn't as excited as I was. Everyone waved their hands without a soul and guided us on the ride with no expression on their faces. I think it's right that you looked tired and tired. review_en: Korea's representative adventure theme park is a two-wall theme park with Everland (Samsung Group) located in Yongin, Gyeonggi Province. If Everland has built a theme park using a large outdoor area outside of the city, Lotte World is also located in Jamsil, the busiest city in Seoul. The indoor theme park and outdoor theme park play facilities, which can be enjoyed regardless of the weather, provide a dense yet full range of entertainment. If it's hard to go all the way to Everland, it would be good to try Lotte World.

review_en: Lotte World is the largest amusement park in Seoul where visitors can visit anytime in all four seasons. The indoor and outdoor are separated, so you can enjoy it all the time whether it rains or snow. It is also close to Lotte Department Store, Lotte Mart, and Lotte Hotel, so it is convenient for sightseeing and eating. The Lotte World Parade will be performed twice at 2 p.m. and 8:30 p.m. There is a place to eat in Lotte World, and if you go to the folk museum located on the 3rd floor of Lotte World, it is good to have a traditional Korean restaurant.

review_en: Lotte World, a theme park full of dreams and hopes! There is a place where not only young children but also adults' hearts melt at once. Even if you don't have to ride the rides yourself, you can feel the atmosphere here and laugh enough for the children. The smile is built and the mind is calm. It's been a long time since I last saw Lotte World. When I was in college, I used to come to church with my friends once in a while, but after I became a member of society, it's hard to get together and I don't have to come. The curious girl is tall.
